name: claim_season_reward
attributes: # [doc = " シーズン報酬を請求するが、"]
# [doc = " season_reward.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let season_reward = & mut ctx . accounts . season_reward ;
season_reward . season_id = ctx . accounts . config . season_id ;
let amount = ctx . accounts . config . reward_amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . reward_vault . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += amount ;

fields.name: season_reward
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を付与して所有者一致を検証すべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬を請求するユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: reward_vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬を保管するプールアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " シーズン報酬設定アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この請求アカウントを所有するべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: claimed
fields.attribute: # [doc = " すでに請求済みかどうか"]

fields.name: season_id
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 対象シーズンの固定 ID"]
